entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid generic instantiation #24951
  • Labels disappear on Windows when switching theme #24950
  • TemplatedView and TemplateBinding not working anymore in NET9 #24949
  • [net9.0, iOS, Xharness] Xharness keeps freezing up on net9.0 branch #24942
    Backlog
  • High crash rate: 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.Compatibility.ShellPageRendererTracker+TitleViewContainer' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument. #24938

Closed

  • Workload sets don't seem to work for pinning a MAUI version (in DevOps) #24940
  • .net8 maui ios app crashing on startup on actual device #24932
  • [Android] ImageButton CornerRadius has nothing to do with Xamarin.Forms CornerRadius #24939
  • Grouped CollectionView content/items overlaps on iOS when data changes or when pull to refresh data #20336
    Backlog
  • CollectionView with grouping show duplicates groups or crash when adding/removing data on iOS and MacCatalyst #17969
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Maui app is not built into any iOS device #24937

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0 Merge main to net9.0 #24953
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #24952
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948
    community ✨
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fix shadow invalidation on Android #24941
    community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Fix for the CollectionView to prevent duplicate groups or crashes when adding a new item to a group or when adding a new group. #24873
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Localization] Change OneLoc branch to 'lego' #24946
    area-localization
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨

Updated

  • [macios] Bump .NET 8 to support Xcode 16.0 #24833
  • [ci] Build with arcade #24625
    area-infrastructure
  • [UITesting] Moved ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to Appium #24934
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Android] CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area-xaml, community ✨, stale
  • [XC] Add feature switch to enable compiling bindings with source #24924
    area-xaml, 9.0-rc2
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly when ItemsSource change #24717
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
    area-blazor
  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • AppThemeBinding on ToolbarItems #24886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-menubar
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
